stepBody: Jay has lemon, orange, and pomegranate trees in his backyard. An orange weighs $$8$$ oz, a lemon $$5$$ oz, and a pomegranate $$11$$ oz. Jay picked $$142$$ pieces of fruit weighing a total of $$70$$ lb, $$10$$ oz. He picked $$15.5$$ times more oranges than pomegranates. How many of oranges did Jay pick?
